mainHeading: Comprehensive Solutions for Your SACCO Needs
subDescription: From seamless member onboarding to robust financial management, our platform offers a complete suite of tools designed to empower your SACCO's growth and efficiency.

features.title: Member Onboarding
features.description: Capture KYC data, scanned documents and next‑of‑kin details in one seamless workflow.

features.title: Savings & Shares
features.description: Track deposits, withdrawals and share transactions with a full audit trail.

features.title: Loan Management
features.description: From application and approval to disbursement and repayment scheduling.

features.title: Accounting & Reporting
features.description: Built‑in double‑entry ledgers, KPI dashboards and exportable PDF/Excel reports.

features.title: Document Management
features.description: Secure storage of collateral, receipts and member documents with UUID‑based file paths.

features.title: Notifications & Alerts
features.description: Automated SMS, email and in‑app reminders with deduplication and retry logic.
